item.description:
Come and meet other Boston area Sci-Fi and Fantasy fans in a comfortable setting.

We're still trying out various locations for our regular monthly social meetup, for July, I've tentatively set it back to Tavern in the Square in Porter Square.While it was a bit loud, it is easy to get there on the T, and wasn't too expensive. If you have an alternate suggestion for some place that can handle 15-20 people and is a bit quieter, please speak up!

We'll probably talk about the books, television, movies, comics and games that we like (and those we don't like, and even those we may be ashamed to admit that we like), but there is no set agenda!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Red Meetup sign!
item.name: Social Meetup
